headline: Jim Cramer Sees Strong Fundamentals Underneath Nucor’s Mixed Quarter Results
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about, along with the memory shortage. Cramer highlighted the company’s “mixed quarter,” as he commented: What else? Last night, Nucor, our largest steel company, reported a mixed quarter and shares pulled back today, but the stock was up at its 52-week high coming into […]

headline: Josh Brown's "Best Stocks in the Market:" Nucor
summary: Josh Brown, CEO of Ritholtz Wealth Management, joins CNBC's "Halftime Report" to explain why material stock Nucor is in his "Best Stocks in the Market." The Committee debate the call.

headline: Nucor Balances Growth Projects And Decarbonization With Earnings And Buybacks
summary: Nucor (NYSE:NUE) is moving ahead with growth and decarbonization plans, including completing major projects and advancing low carbon steel initiatives. The company has a new mill project in West Virginia and is pursuing net zero carbon steel offerings alongside a new fusion energy partnership. These steps come as Nucor reports solid demand, strong segment backlogs, and support from federal policies for domestic steel producers. Nucor is a large US based steel producer with operations across...
